entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as showing Harry a symbol beneath it. She also lit her wand to read the name on the headstone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being shown the symbol by Hermione and trying to find his parents in the graveyard.

entities.name: ignotus
entities.description: Ignotus is mentioned as a name on the headstone that Hermione reads with her wand.

entities.name: abbott
entities.description: Abbott is mentioned as a surname of a Wizarding family represented in the graveyard.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is mentioned as the location where Harry is searching for his parents and where there are graves of Wizarding families.

relationships.description: Hermione showed Harry a symbol beneath it.
Harry is related to Ignotus through the headstone where Hermione reads the name.
Hermione mentions Abbott as a surname of a Wizarding family represented in the graveyard.
Harry is searching for his parents in Godric's Hollow.
